entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
